I'm here in Houston, TX attending the [Grace Hopper Celebration](https://ghc.anitab.org/) for the first time!

It's exhilarating to be finally attending, I've wanted to go for years but the scheduling just didn't work out. Last year, I got my internship with The Walt Disney Company for Summer 2018 through the [Resume Database](https://ghc.anitab.org/resume-database/).
